name: Freestyle Scooter Game (itch)
description:
Make sure to inform us about any bug that you find and also let us know, what would you like us to improve, we would be really grateful for that!

Contact: kos.matous1(at)gmail.com

Freestyle scooter game is a game, where you ride your scooter in a skatepark and perform tricks. You will be able to choose from variety of scooters and levels. We would also like to add some kind of score system and maybe unlock system too.

Controls:

  • Controls help: I
  • Movement: Arrow keys
  • Trick Menu: T
  • Camera view: Q and E
  • Tricks: A, S, D, F
  • Jump - Spacebar

Features to implement:

  • More tricks, scooters and levels
  • Score & unlock system
  • ?Multiplayer?

Programming: Hynek Kydlíček
Graphics: Matouš Kos - https://maty1999.deviantart.com/
Composer: Gabriel Mann - https://soundcloud.com/garbwiredude/sets/my-compos...
